Ranged Weapon Attack:
 +4 to hit, range 30/120 ft., one target. 
Hit:
 5 (1d6 + 2) piercing damage, and
the target must succeed on a DC 13 Constitution saving throw or be poisoned for 1 hour. If the saving throw fails by 5 or more, the target is also
unconscious while poisoned in this way. The target wakes up if it takes damage or if another creature takes an action to shake it awake.
Melee Weapon Attack: +4 to hit, reach 5 ft., one target. Hit: 5 (1d6 + 2) piercing damage.

description:
Medium humanoid (elf), neutral evil
Armor Class 15 (chain shirt)  
Hit Points 13 (3d8)  
Speed 30 ft.
name: Elf, Drow
